reviewText:
A very good cold war action movie.  Can't wait for it to come out on DVD.

One tends to forget that George Segal was a dramatic actor before he turned to comedy.  Very good performance.
Superb acting, entangled plot and sharp editing...but if you can't do that T&A will save the day!
Its a movie I can watch again and again.  George Segal is excellent as Corporal Shavers.  Will buy it when available in DVD format.
